events.body: Since `netconf` values should override main config settings, you want to load `netconf` before `conf`, I think. See https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blame/master/src/util.cpp#L546

> Since netconf values should override main config settings, you want to load netconf before conf, I think

That's not possible, as conf can specify the network.
Edited: What I said doesn't really make a difference. It's still not possible as you say.

verification.payload:
tree 635b7103631109ae74fc6336cf4f2e630a1e6b2c
parent 2db4cbcc437f51f5dac82cc4de46f383b92e6f11
author R E Broadley <rebroad+github@gmail.com> 1482315341 +0700
committer R E Broadley <rebroad+github@gmail.com> 1482916898 +0700

Allow per network network.conf

The network.conf is processed in the same way as the bitcoin.conf and it
is looked for in the data directory, and processed after the
bitcoin.conf.

Fixes #9374

events.message:
Allow per network network.conf

The network.conf is processed in the same way as the bitcoin.conf and it
is looked for in the data directory, and processed after the
bitcoin.conf.

Fixes #9374

events.body: Lack of feedback, and still needs a rebase. Feel free to reopen when it has been.
